reviewText: This is a nice horror pack.
Bought this set of horror movies for my son.  He is very satisfied.
The movies are ok for the priced I payed

Passed (sic) the Door of Darkness and Fist of the Vampire.

Door of Darkness is one of those Se7en knock-offs, but manages to make the idea its own. The ending was especially delicious.

And Fist of the Vampire? Exactly what the name implies. Vampires. Punching each other. A lot. If you're a fan of mindless martial arts films, this is one for you. The choreography is definitely amateur but surprisingly well-done, and there are female characters in here who are not irritating. WHAT?! Given, the story is a little ridiculous, but what do you expect from vampires punching each other in the face?

The other films in here are featured in many other multi-movie DVDs, and if they aren't, they weren't so memorable as to earn a mention in my review. So, spend the $5.00 just for Door of Darkness and Fist of the Vampire!
very good movies to watch on rainy days or nights they can make your spine curl .good entertainment for the unscared
I love this and the compact fitting of ten horror pictures.  These movies are classic and viewing is awesome, enjoyed
Great variety pack of movies, love it. Purchased it for a gift. Arrived quickler than expected and was well packaged for protection.
it was very good deal i got 10 movies for the price of one very good horrer colection will have fun watching
